title: How to Make Peppermint Schnapps

steps.headline: Get a 2 quart pan and put over the range or stove.
steps.description: Heat the corn syrup and sugar in the pan over medium heat.

steps.headline: Make sure that the sugar completely dissolves.
steps.description: You can stir occasionally for about 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Add the vodka to the mixture when the sugar has dissolved.
Turn off the heat and make sure that the mixture is tightly covered.
steps.description: Set it aside for it to cool down.

steps.headline: Get the peppermint extract and add it to the mixture.
steps.description: Also, get a sealable container to pour the complete mixture into. Store until ready for use.

text: Get a 2 quart pan and put over the range or stove. Heat the corn syrup and sugar in the pan over medium heat. Make sure that the sugar completely dissolves. You can stir occasionally for about 5 minutes. Add the vodka to the mixture when the sugar has dissolved. Stir the vodka in well. Turn off the heat and make sure that the mixture is tightly covered. Set it aside for it to cool down. Get the peppermint extract and add it to the mixture. Also, get a sealable container to pour the complete mixture into. Store until ready for use.
